typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Folder_name as string ('NoValue'),
	Tablet_name as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 derive(CREATED_ON = currentTimestamp(),
		SOURCE = '01_RAW/SAPHANA/'+ $Folder_name) ~> technMetaCol
technMetaCol sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:[(concat('IF EXISTS ( SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ', 'STAGE.',$Folder_name, ') ', 'TRUNCATE TABLE ', 'STAGE.',$Folder_name))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> hubToStage
